mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (avator, userName, password, phoneNumber, createdTime, email) VALUES (#{avator},#{userName},#{password},#{phoneNumber},#{createdTime},#{email})
UPDATE user SET avator=#{avator} WHERE phoneNumber = #{phoneNumber}
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET userName=#{userName} WHERE phoneNumber = #{phoneNumber}
UPDATE user SET password=#{password} WHERE phoneNumber = #{phoneNumber}
